about_the_game:
Springs of Ardor is a explicit visual novel/lite adventure game made in Full HD, with the following themes; Gay, Romance, Humor, Polyamory, Group Sex, Muscle Worship, Mystery and Magic.


  • Over 6 hours of play.
  • Contains over 800 renders.
  • 18 Different sex scenes.
  • More than 200 gallery unlockables.
  • Over 18 Steam achievements
  • Embark on a thrilling journey through a nudist resort on a tropical paradise island, where nudity reigns supreme! Get ready for an indulgent escape filled with gratuitous nudity at every turn!


Embark on an electrifying adventure with Noah, a perpetually lustful young gay man, as he unexpectedly inherits the illustrious Ardor Springs from his estranged uncle Harold. Dive headfirst into the riveting revelation of Ardor Springs, a men-only nudist haven nestled on the sun-kissed shores of Coralina Island, and discover the awe-inspiring power it bestows upon its new heir. Brace yourself for a whirlwind of responsibility and revelation as Noah navigates this uncharted territory.

Fear not, for Noah is not alone in his journey! Within the vibrant enclave of Ardor Springs, a cadre of eager men stands ready to offer their unwavering support, and perhaps a bit more! From the ruggedly handsome Juan, affectionately known as “Big Guy,” to the irresistibly suave Mateo, fondly dubbed “My Popstar” for his modern allure, Noah finds himself surrounded by allies who are eager to lend a helping hand, and maybe even steal his heart along the way. Join Noah on this sensational voyage where every twist and turn promises excitement, intrigue, and a dash of steamy romance!

content_descriptors.notes: Springs of Ardor contains strong language, partial and full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral and anal), threesome sex and group sex. It also contains faul language and a small part with dubious consent.

name: Springs of Ardor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Springs of Ardor is a visual novel game that takes players on a thrilling journey through a nudist resort on a tropical paradise island, where nudity reigns supreme! Get ready for an indulgent escape filled with gratuitous nudity at every turn!
